channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Illustrator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Illustrator

item.title: CVE-2020-9574|2024-08-04T10:34:39.581Z -- adobe -- adobe%20illustrator
item.description: Adobe Illustrator versions 24.0.2 and earlier have a memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .
